title: Abzu
brief_description: ABZÛ is an exploration game where you are a lone diver in a lush ocean world. The diver descends deeper and deeper into the depths, where she will encounter majestic creatures, discover ancient secrets, and search for her true purpose.

constellations_other.name: The Pitch
constellations_other.description: Explore fantastical worlds and underwater seascapes.
